name: UNO PIXEL - Card Game
description:
UNO PIXEL - Card Game

by Dimitri Kozma

This is the retro pixel art Uno game. I hope you like. ;-)

Sequel of simple, funny and addictive classic card inspired on Uno game.

There's some small engine upgrades, but the basics still the same of the first version. The most improvements is on graphics

Play against the computer and try win as many times you can!

The AI is quite simple making this a easy and casual game.

The main rules are the same of the original game, but are some differences, like the score, just counting how many times do you win the computer.
There's no reverse card and another specific UNO rules, but the main structure is the same.

Instructions

Use the mouse
Read the rules on screen.

Release N.: V.2.0 - 2010
